name: Mitch Moore
text: Has a lot of potential. Place looks nice and the bar has a respectable selection. Just for the love of God and all that is holy DO NOT go on a Thursday...They have this DJ there for kareoke on Thursday and all the dude plays is dubstep. Man cannot read a room for his life and completely ruins the vibe of a pool hall. Bright side is, if you like singing kareoke you'll be the most popular person there for giving the crowd a much desired break from his objectively terrible aux.

text: Awesome staff, nice tables with varied sizes, good drink prices and LIVE MUSIC the night I was there.

name: Dianne Hayes
text: The service was awesome at the new Club Virgo, and the drink prices were decent. Absolutely loved the music selection. We had a great time, and will be visiting again next weekend.

name: Buckwheat256
text: Poor service unless you go during the week when it's not crowded. If you plan on going on a weekend be sure to wear your bullet proof vest. Like I said earlier, this place isn't bad during the week, but during peek hours it leaves something to be desired. Their drink prices are also pretty bad. Go to Bumper's if you're looking for a nice billards experience.

name: T “Mix Master” T
text: The New Club Virgo is a totally different from experience from the old shooters pool hall. Great friendly service, awsome sound and nightly specials that sure to please everyone. Everyone is welcome!! Changes are still being made but thus will be the premiere night spot for Madison, Athens and Huntsville area.

name: Drucilla Fulwise
text: Virgo is a really nice place to relax and get a drink with some friends. The dj was great. We had a great time, can't wait until our next visit.

name: Corey Johnson
text: The service I had was good. As a pool player, I found the tables to be very nice. Yeah....I will be going back very soon.

name: Dj Travo
text: I don't know about "shooters" but the new club Virgo was really nice, great atmosphere,  friendly staff and the food was awesome! I went on a Saturday night and had a great time, Virgo is highly recommended...I will be going back!!

name: Chris Victor
text:
The place smells like urine. Might have something to do with the disgusting restrooms.

Terrible bartenders.

They do have about 30 tables, so you can definitely play some pool but other than that this place should be avoided.

text: Great environment! Pool tables are are worn out with tares in the felt but the people make the difference. If you're looking for a nice place to hang out and have a drink with friendly strangers this is it. Con: The Pool tables need attention.

name: D Man
text: Awe shoot get it

name: Carl Broadway
text: Came 30 minutes away to play pool and they close at 5 o'clock.

name: Zion Bethel
text:
GREAT GREAT GREAT!! A very unique two story bar experience with great food, a wide selection of alcoholic beverages, and an arcade for the books! The adult equivalent of Dave & Busters! The owner is usually on site and is extremely friendly and passionate about the place, and has plans to expand the arcade to include more activities.

Most games cost .50¢ or no more than $1.00, but the pool tables are free to play and the iceball roller game is as well.

All in all, if you're looking for a fresh and new bar experience that has many friendly faces, isn't too packed, doesn't kill conversation with loud music, and serves food that leaves nothing to be desired, this is the place for you and your friends!

Come grab a drink and play some classic arcade games!

name: Hornaday quickfire
text: This place is awesome and worthy of a visit. Video games all over. Pool, darts, pinball, classic games, and kid friendly till about 8. Good drink selection, and they have pizza. We had a great time!

name: nathanialorion
text: From a local business owner myself to any local looking for a good place, you found it!!! Best place in town

name: Zachary Diedrich
text: Loved this place!!  So much fun!  Great atmosphere, great staff, and free pool during happy hour!!!

name: Heather Gibbs
text: Super cool place! The staff was more than friendly!

name: Courtney Bradley
text: Great place for family fun! My little boy loves to play the reasonably priced games, I like the great prices on the menu and cocktails! Having his 7th birthday party here in January! Pictures to follow!

name: Ben Gottfried
text: Best place for a drink in daphne-fairhope area. Very friendly bartenders with a nice and new atmosphere. Lots of games like pool, darts, pinball, skee ball, basketball, and some others. Great for adults and the younger crowd.

text: Awesome staff amazing food great place in general so honestly I cant wait to go back. It's fun great people dont even get me started on the food. I had the Turkey bacon ranch and I'm pretty sure I'll be going there for the sandwich bc yes it is amazing.  I highly recommend going there

name: Krystal Bost
text: It's called the Wet Whistle now, there have been changes in ownership/management, and on the inside of the place. They also serve food now, which is cool. The service was really good, the inside of the place looked nice, but not uptight. They have live music on weekends as well. Would definitely recommend.

name: John Ebersole
text: Nice people. Awesome drink specials on Friday and Saturday night during happy hour.

name: Bobby Jones
text:
It's now the Wet Whistle. I had a great time, live local band and dancing with a bit older crowd. I'm thinking 30-40😁😁
Saw lots of friends.

name: Tristan Harman
text: Good drinks, great drag show aside from the wonky speaker system.

name: Alan Wiley
text: Had good time thanks for opening for the parade

name: Perry Baxter
text: It's been 5 year's since I've been out to a bar I had the best time here hung out with a lot of old friend of mine who I haven't seen for a long time it was a great time and the place was nice inside and out.

name: George Brunner
text: I love this place but its cald the wet whistle now

name: Michael Abernathy
text: It's not the Caldwell Tavern anymore it's called the wet whistle and it's a good bar to hang out with friends for a while, they  book a lot of different style of bands and musicians,sometime the music is a little overwhelming, I think the bands sometimes thinks they are in a outdoor stadium, or is it the old saying, if you're not good be loud

name: Brian Self
text: Permanent closed

text: Enjoy playing here and they have pretty good food for such a small place

text: Great place to play pool. Family oriented. Good food.

name: Chance Rosic
text: Good place.  Good tables. Good food. Good drinks. Good people.

text: If you like pool and a good time come on down to Papa G's where the good times roll

name: Teresa Mendoza
text: Great entertainment, good tables and food

name: Crystal Calhoun
text: Clean and very nice staff! Great Place to Shoot Pool

name: Michael Smith
text: I love Poppa G's everyone is family.

name: Eric Posey
text: I only go on league nights (Friday) to watch a friend play. Tables are many, around 20 maybe more. A/c is good. They sell supplies and offer repair services. The food is great, if you want a good cheeseburger or chicken sandwich. Very close to homemade. Service is fantastic, Amber is always there and makes you feel like you're part of the family. Best pool hall I've ever been to!

name: Jason Burrus
text: I just walked in and said I wanted to play league billiards. These guys got me signed up and on a team that week. Has been a great place full of friendly faces to learn and improve my game. Great tables, good food, clean, friendly staff...awesome!

name: ChaseElliottFan9
text: Great place to play pool. Family oriented. Good food.

name: Angel
text: One of the best places to shoot some pool and hang out with friends. The staff is awesome and will take great care of you. They have a great drink selection and they also have a small kitchen that pumps out one of the best club sandwiches in Pelham.

name: Robert Chambers
text: I went to papa g’s tonight to shoot a few games and check the place out. They have a great atmosphere and really good tables. There’s no smoking inside which was even better. Very clean, everything neat and in place. Plenty of room around the tables to shoot and good lighting over the table. The pro shop really does good work, had him install a new tip for me, he took his time and made sure it was right(sorry can’t remember his name). They also have a nice selection of cues in house competitively priced. I will definitely be going back.

name: Heather Bridgman
text: Huge pool hall. Prices are great, for the regular tables. Wasn't properly informed on prices for 9 foot tables. Overall, a great place to play. Staff was very friendly.

name: Hayden Wood
text: The staff here is INCREDIBLE! It seriously feels like walking into the set of Cheers. Everyone is friendly, personable, and helpful. They keep a tight ship and the place always looks nice. And The food and drink is really good too!

name: Tonya Roberts
text: We go all the way to Poppas Gs 3 to 4 times a week... And we live all the way in Oakman, AL... It is a family oriented place... Me and My family really enjoys going there to play Pool.... And the owner: Michael Glass is one of the most humble men I've ever met.. So.. With that being said.. We are apart of the POPPA Gs family... You will love it and I... promise u will come back for the 2nd, and 3rd and so on..  God bless

name: Lindsay Brand
text: Wonderful place that ALWAYS makes you feel like family!! Best waitresses around that ALWAYS remember your order!! (even extra cheese and pickles LOL) Wonderful place to shoot pool and have a great time!! Would give it more than 5 stars if I could!

name: Michele Mann (Chele)
text: Great place to play pool. Great food and service. Always a fun time when we go.

name: Angie Roddy
text: This is the most friendly place I have been to. Everyone extremely nice and are there to have fun. They have karaoke on Saturday nights great bar tenders and awesome food. Reasonable prices. The owner comes in ever night and personally talks and greats everyone. Great place for some family fun.

name: Tony Sides
text: Fantastic pool hall. I'm becoming a regular visitor.

name: katielourocks
text: Always a great experience.  The staff is amazing, the food and drinks are great, the tables are top notch, and it’s so clean. We love Poppa’s!!!!

name: Leslie Dials
text: Awesome staff great tables

name: Lindsay Brand
text: Wonderful place that ALWAYS makes you feel like family!! Best waitresses around that ALWAYS remember your order!! (even extra cheese and pickles LOL) Wonderful place to shoot pool and have a great time!! Would give it more than 5 stars if I could!

name: Karen Smith
text: Good service  good food and the fact that it's smoke free so it's good place to take your kids is a plus I love the fact that it's kid friendly!!!!

text: This is the most friendly place I have been to. Everyone extremely nice and are there to have fun. They have karaoke on Saturday nights great bar tenders and awesome food. Reasonable prices. The owner comes in ever night and personally talks and greats everyone. Great place for some family fun.

text: Been going to this pool hall for over 20 years... The g was added and it really became a lovely venue... Great staff ...amazing owners and great tables

name: Gary Woods
text: Always have fun here. A great place to shoot pool, friendly staff, and great food. It's kid friendly as well so families can go have fun as well.

text: Pool, pool and more pool! Great crowd, great drinks, great food and great time! Always lives up to it expectations. Everyone is welcoming from staff to customers... which is a plus in my book!

name: Craig Salter
text: Love Poppa G's. Sara is really nice. Nice place.

name: michael hooten
text: I've been playing there for 14 years. Awesome place to get away, take someone out for the evening or find a game. Everyone one is respectful there. If someone were to get out of line there they would be corrected immediately  it's like second family for me no judgement in this pool hall. Food and service is A-1 come hang out you will see for yourself.

name: Carloss fu
text: website said 6$ a table, rude lady said 6$ per person, and why do you have to be 21 to play pool????

resp.text: Hey Carloss,  sorry to hear about this.  As you can see our official website @ https://poppagsbilliards.com doesn't show any pricing.   You don't have to be 21 to play pool but you do have to be 21 to be in a bar in Pelham, AL.  We'd love to chat with you in regards to any of our staff being rude so that we can fix any issues necessary.  As you can see by all our other reviews that are 5 stars, customer service is priority and something we take great pride in.  Feel free to give us a call or come by during business hours and we'll be happy to do whatever possible to make sure your next Poppa G's visit is nothing shy of a 5-star experience.
